channel.title: Tonislav Hristov on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Tonislav Hristov on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Golden Globe Nominated Producer Making Movies Sets Laura Birn, Oona Airola For Klaus Härö Directed ‘Blue Baby’ and Preps ‘Quiet Lake’ from Tonislav Hristov (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Golden Globe-nominated Klaus Härö (“The Fencer”) and twice Sundance-selected Tonislav Hristov (“The Good Postman,” “The Magic Life of V”) are readying their next pics with regular production partners
